snippet.title: Fairy Tail - Characters & Features Trailer
snippet.description:
Highlighting some features from our #FairyTailGame 

- Character stories: Witness suprising scenes featuring a variety of characters
- Strengthen connections with party members to unlock new skills

Make your dream team on 7/30 (Steam) & 7/31 (PS4/Switch)

Pre-order while you still can!

PS4: https://bit.ly/FairyTailPS
Digital Deluxe: https://bit.ly/FTDXPS

Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/FTSwitch

PC Steam: http://bit.ly/FairyTailSteam


#FAIRYTAIL #KTFamily #GUST #GustGames #HiroMashima

https://www.fairytailgame.com/us/
